one_phrase_summary.description: A concise one-sentence summary of the element's purpose.

summary.description: A brief description of the element's purpose and functionality.

categories.description: An array of relevant categories for this element, focusing on its content and use.

functionality.description: An array describing the potential functionalities and use cases of the element.

media_files_description.description: A detailed description of images or videos within the element, or null if none are present.

key_words.description: An array of key phrases or words relevant to the element for search purposes.

relevant_fields.description: A list of relevant fields or attributes for the element, or null if not applicable.

curiosities.description: Unique or remarkable aspects of the element, or null if none are applicable.

accessibility.description: Accessibility considerations for the element, or null if none exist.
